mapper.select: SELECT users_no ,users_id ,users_name ,users_phone ,users_role FROM users WHERE users_no = #{usersNo}

SELECT r.request_no ,r.requester ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.ctt_place) as ctt_place ,r.ctt_place_area ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.ctt_place_situation) as ctt_place_situation ,r.hope_ctt_budget ,r.hope_ctt_start_dt ,r.hope_ctt_end_dt ,r.postcode ,r.address ,r.detail_address ,r.title ,r.content ,r.write_dt ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.request_state) as request_state ,r.file_id ,f.save_name ,f.ext ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.category_code) as category_code ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.region_code) as region_code ,u.users_name FROM request r JOIN users u ON r.requester = u.users_no LEFT OUTER JOIN file_detail_info f ON r.file_id = f.file_id JOIN file_attr p ON p.file_id = f.file_id WHERE p.file_id = #{fileId} and boss_tf = 'y' ORDER BY r.request_no desc

SELECT r.request_no ,r.requester ,r.ctt_place ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.ctt_place) as ctt_place_nm ,r.ctt_place_area ,r.ctt_place_situation ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.ctt_place_situation) as ctt_place_situation_nm ,r.hope_ctt_budget ,r.hope_ctt_start_dt ,r.hope_ctt_end_dt ,r.postcode ,r.address ,r.detail_address ,r.title ,r.content ,r.write_dt ,r.request_state ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.request_state) as request_state_nm ,r.region_code ,r.file_id ,f.save_name ,f.ext ,r.category_code ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.category_code) as category_code_nm ,u.users_name FROM request r JOIN users u ON r.requester = u.users_no LEFT OUTER JOIN file_detail_info f ON r.file_id = f.file_id
WHERE r.request_no = #{requestNo}

SELECT p.worker ,u.users_name ,p.ctt_start_dt ,p.ctt_end_dt ,u.users_phone ,p.comments ,r.request_no FROM proposal p JOIN users u ON u.users_no = p.worker LEFT OUTER JOIN request r ON r.request_no = p.request_no WHERE r.request_no =#{requestNo} ORDER BY p.proposal_no desc
